results.title: Pandas aren't always cuddly
results.brief_description: Did you know that pandas need to eat 45 kilos of bamboo each night in order to survive? Even a hundred years after its discovery, the Giant Panda is still a mystery. This special video explores the natural behaviour of the Giant Panda, filming its unique courtship rituals and the feeding and nurturing of its young. Narrated by David Attenborough, the secret life of the panda may shatter all your illusions.

results.title: Pancho
results.brief_description: From the book written and illustrated by Berta and Elmer Hader, this animated story tells of a young Mexican boy, Pancho, who unexpectedly becomes a hero when he captures a bull.

results.title: Panama Canal: the mountain and the mosquito
results.creator_credit: Richard D'Alessio, Christopher Rowley, Jane Armstrong and National Geographic Television
results.brief_description: This National Geographic documentary uses rare archival footage together with re-enactments to tell the story of the construction of the Panama Canal. Driven by both military and economic imperatives, U.S President Theodore Roosevelt pushed this project which would link the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans. He appointed railroad and civil engineer John Stevens to lead the massive engineering endeavour. Appalled by the poor health and low morale under which earlier crews had laboured in the project, Stevens improved conditions and accommodation for the 24,000 construction workers. He was assisted by physician William Crawford Gorgas, who brought under control the tropical diseases of malaria and yellow fever. After 7 years of evacuation and construction, a lock system was established across the isthmus which opened in 1914.

results.title: Panama (K)
results.creator_credit: Ernest Troost, Egenolf Jeske, Klemens Jeske and Arbeitsgruppe Medienverband
results.brief_description: Based on the book “Oh, wie schon Ist Panama” by Janosch. Published in the US under the title “The trip to Panama”. English version by Judy Duris. Little Bear and Little Tiger are two friends who abandon their happy home to search for Panama - ‘the land of our dreams’- only to return to the place from which they came. A subtle treatment of the theme of appreciating what you already have.

results.title: PANACEA: the documentary
results.creator_credit: Ioannis Ioannou, Cinemedia, Rose Myers, Vanessa Rouse and Arena Theatre Company
results.brief_description: ‘PANACEA the documentary’ follows the journey of Arena Theatre Company’s creative team as they embark on an ambitious large scale performance event fusing modern technology and cinematic devices. A combination of conventional theatre and MTV culture.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ioannis Ioannou, Cinemedia, Rose Myers, Vanessa Rouse and Arena Theatre Company

results.title: Panacea - the Soundtrack
results.brief_description:
A cast of ten, a teenage boy, live musicians, full musical score, six projection surfaces, digital animation and a sublime visual setting, mark this production as the largest ever produced by Arena.

Music Director: Hugh Covill
Music composed by: Hugh Covill with Rosemary Myers and Dave Watts

results.title: Panacea - The Documentary
results.brief_description: Panacea the Documentary follows the journey of Arena Theatre Company’s creative team as they embark on an ambitious large scale perfromance event fusing modern technology and cinematic devices. We follow the journey of the team as they wrestle with combining conventional theatre and MTV culture.
